name: DodgeTheDisc3D
description:
This is my second game ever made, the first was following brackeys tutorial with a little bit extra added. This was made for the DiscRoom Game Jam so I could practice.  Its really basic and probably bad compared to a lot of the other games out there. Let me know what I could've done better.

The main Goal of the game is to survive as long as you can. Disc's will fly out of the walls they spawn faster and faster as the game goes on.
